overview: After his sister, Nimmo, is tragically killed while in love with Jagira, Sardar Pratap Singh forbids anyone to fall in love. Years later he will end up deeply regretting this decision as he will find out that his very own daughter, Preeto, has fallen in love with Jeeto. He must now publicly punish her so as to set an an example for the entire community.
title: Nain Preeto De
